title: Generative AI-Enabled Instructional Design Strategies for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on concept mapping and lesson design activities combining ChatGPT and peer assessment in a smartphone-based restricted technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can generate and revise social studies concept maps using ChatGPT.
Learners can improve lesson design plans by incorporating peer assessment feedback.
Learners can apply higher-order thinking skills in instructional design processes utilizing generative AI.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
